name: SH - Shadow Copy
description:
Controls:
WASD - movement.
LMC - throw Shuriken.
RMC - spawn Shadow.
When Shuriken touch the Shadow, you swap position with that Shadow.

Plot:
As ninja, you must destroy your evil vigilante.
He is strong, but you can create your shadow copies...But only four in total.
Who will win - brute force or shadow discipline?

Special for Trijam#206 (game made in 3 hours)
Engine:   KaboomJS (https://kaboomjs.com/)
SFX:   jsfxr(https://sfxr.me/)
